title: Process a Device Trade-in
description: A customer upgrading their phone wants to trade in their old device for credit.

tasks.description: Identify the model and condition of the customer's old device to determine its trade-in value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the trade-in tool to provide a quote for the old device.

tasks.description: Explain the trade-in process: how the credit will be applied and how to ship the old device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the full process.

tasks.description: Process the trade-in and generate a shipping label for the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the trade-in and sends the shipping label.
